reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress comfortable and well-fitting, with one noting it hits right at the feet, and appreciate its soft, stretchy material. Customers love the pockets, with one noting they're well-hidden, and while the dress is generally flattering, some mention it's a bit see-through.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars This dress is amazing
items.body: This dress quickly became a favorite for me. I like to wear it when I want to look nice and put together but I don't feel like getting dressed. It is very comfortable and lightweight. It fits me perfectly, looks great, and I love that it has pockets. Definitely tall woman friendly. Read more
items.author: Lunatelly

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice dress
items.body: Beautiful dress. Everything fits in proportion. Pockets are well hidden. Wears easy and gently. Read more
items.author: sfvg

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dress up or down - Comfortable and Stretchy!
items.body: Stretchy & Comfortable. I have purchased it in multiple colors, both long and short sleeved. Fabric is not always the same, sometimes slick like stretchy rayon and sometimes more like spandex cotton. Both are attractive and comfortable. At 5'5", the long dresses are the right length to wear with flats. The pockets are perfect and I get a bunch of compliments! Read more
items.author: Katherine W.A.

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute but...
items.body: I'll start off with my size. I'm 5'3 and 195LBS. love the green shade of the dress. It's a great color for the cooler months and holidays. I bought an XL. I wasn't sure if I should've went with a Large, ONLY because I have two dresses that are a similar style, but from a different brand, that are in the size Large, and they fit nicely. However, I'm so happy I went with the XL, cause the top part have very little give. My arms (and chest) are on the Thicker side, and that's where the tightness is. It's long, but I could wear flats with it. I will be keeping this one. UPDATE: I washed it, and tried it on.... SO MUCH BETTER! The upper arms are still a little snug, but it's comfortable. Hits right at my feet still (love that). It pairs nicely with my black wide waist belt. Plan on wearing to a Sweeny Todd Play here in a few weeks, adding some gold jewelry. Will be wearing this a lot, especially around the holidays. Read more
items.author: gena

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfy, flowy, and just the right length!
items.body: Wore this dress to a Valentine’s Day dance with my first grader! It’s so comfortable, I didn’t have time to wash it before the dance but it wasn’t wrinkled out of the package and worked just fine. Added bonus that it has pockets so I was able to have my hands empty the whole night! I’m only 5’3” so I wore boots with this dress and it was the perfect length. I was also only 3 months postpartum and loved how it fit! Read more
items.author: Laura Schacht

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Runs small
items.body: Runs small. I usually wear a medium. Should have ordered a large. I have purchased this style from another vendor on Amazon and this mediums fit great. Also the design print is not the same as in the photo representation. The Dre’s I received must have been a return because it obviously was tried on and re packaged and one of the pockets was turned out. Read more
items.author: Maggie t

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful, and good value
items.body: For the price, this is a stylish and well made dress. The material is beautifully soft, not heavy, which is what I wanted. Be sure to check the size guide; I normally wear a large, but, based on the measurements, I ordered an XL. Bonus, it has pockets! I'm seriously thinking about ordering this in another color/print. Read more
items.author: Lynn Pernezny

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this dress!
items.body: I Love this dress!! Super comfortable, and true to size! Very flowy, and pockets are perfect! Read more
items.author: Veronica Elizondo

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: 4-floral White Lily Black, 3-purple Grey, 2-dark Green, 4-snake White, 4-classic Print, 3-mavue, 5-haze Blue 3/4 Sleeve, 3-dark Blue, 3-purple, 4-camouflage Pink, 3-acid Blue, 3-red, 4-blue Palm Leaves, 4-floral Yellow Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
